caption: In a winter castle, a man is making some declarations. He speaks to the people below him, and one of them stands up to respond. They exchange words, possibly discussing matters of importance. Afterward, there seems to be a list being presented, and one person reacts with anger, confronting another individual. However, the second person responds calmly, which only seems to infuriate their friend. Meanwhile, in another location, two men are conspiring. One older man appears composed, while the younger one seems impatient. They are engaged in a discussion, with the younger man urging the older man to make a decision quickly.
